name: irl-pro-location-overlay
description: IRL Pro Location Overlay for Live Streaming - CLI Console Application

scripts.build-win: pkg cli.js --targets node18-win-x64 --output dist/irl-overlay-windows.exe && xcopy public dist\public\ /E /I /Y && copy server.js dist\ && copy embedded-server.js dist\ && copy LICENSE dist\ && copy README.md dist\
scripts.build-linux: pkg cli.js --targets node18-linux-x64 --output dist/irl-overlay-linux-x64 && cp -r public dist/ && cp server.js dist/ && cp embedded-server.js dist/ && cp LICENSE dist/ && cp README.md dist/
scripts.build-linux-arm: pkg cli.js --targets node18-linux-arm64 --output dist/irl-overlay-linux-arm64 && cp -r public dist/ && cp server.js dist/ && cp embedded-server.js dist/ && cp LICENSE dist/ && cp README.md dist/
scripts.build-macos: pkg cli.js --targets node18-macos-x64 --output dist/irl-overlay-macos-intel && cp -r public dist/ && cp server.js dist/ && cp embedded-server.js dist/ && cp LICENSE dist/ && cp README.md dist/
scripts.build-macos-arm: pkg cli.js --targets node18-macos-arm64 --output dist/irl-overlay-macos-m1 && cp -r public dist/ && cp server.js dist/ && cp embedded-server.js dist/ && cp LICENSE dist/ && cp README.md dist/
scripts.build-all: concurrently "npm run build-win" "npm run build-linux" "npm run build-linux-arm" "npm run build-macos" "npm run build-macos-arm"

author: abdulkadirozyurt
